metadata.synopsis: The player encounters a living gremishka in a fight, this line playing on the first turn of combat following a successful check to identify it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Set Roll Amazing- Go to 42; 25; 35 in CRE_Main_A.- This should trigger combat with the Gremishkas. The skill check will be attempted on the first player turn. The PAD plays on a successful check.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Gremishkas? Better be careful with any magic - spells set them off.
